title: Calculate Harmonic Average of an Array
description: This function calculates the harmonic average of a given array of real numbers. It takes as input a pointer to the array and its size. The function iterates through the array elements, summing the reciprocals of the non-zero elements. If a zero element is encountered, the function immediately returns a harmonic average of zero. Otherwise, it divides the total count of valid elements by the sum of their reciprocals to produce the final harmonic average.
name: ARRAY_HAV

input.name: pt
input.description: Pointer to the array of real numbers for which the harmonic average is to be calculated.

input.name: size
input.description: The size of the array, indicating the number of elements to consider for the calculation.

return_value.description: The harmonic average of the array elements.
